headline.main: Spieth Signs Off With Timely 66 at Firestone
headline.print_headline: Spieth Signs Off With Timely 66 at Firestone

docs.snippet: Jordan Spieth gave himself ideal momentum heading into the PGA Championship at Whistling Straits as he signed off with his best score of the week at the WGC-Bridgestone Invitational on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jordan Spieth gave himself ideal momentum heading into the PGA Championship at Whistling Straits as he signed off with his best score of the week at the WGC-Bridgestone Invitational on Sunday.

headline.main: Police Identify 4 Killed in Adirondack Mountains Plane Crash
headline.print_headline: Police Identify 4 Killed in Adirondack Mountains Plane Crash

docs.snippet: The four people killed in a fiery crash after a small plane went down in the Adirondack Mountains were longtime friends who were attending a lacrosse tournament in Lake Placid, police and family members said Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The four people killed in a fiery crash after a small plane went down in the Adirondack Mountains were longtime friends who were attending a lacrosse tournament in Lake Placid, police and family members said Sunday.

headline.main: Blue Jays Win 8th Straight, Sweep Yankees 2-0 to Close In
headline.print_headline: Blue Jays Win 8th Straight, Sweep Yankees 2-0 to Close In

docs.snippet: Everyone already knew the Toronto Blue Jays could really hit. Turns out, it was a trio of splendid pitching performances that closed the gap in the AL East....

headline.main: Man Gets a Year for Printing $100 Bills in Casino Hotel Room
headline.print_headline: Man Gets a Year for Printing $100 Bills in Casino Hotel Room

docs.snippet: A Louisiana man has been sentenced to a year and a day in prison for making $100 counterfeit bills at a casino hotel....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Louisiana man has been sentenced to a year and a day in prison for making $100 counterfeit bills at a casino hotel.

headline.main: Hertha Berlin Team Bus Shot at by Motorcyclist
headline.print_headline: Hertha Berlin Team Bus Shot at by Motorcyclist

docs.snippet: Hertha Berlin's team bus was shot at by a motorcyclist while it was travelling to Bielefeld railway station to pick up the squad ahead of Monday's German Cup match, the Bundesliga club said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Hertha Berlin's team bus was shot at by a motorcyclist while it was travelling to Bielefeld railway station to pick up the squad ahead of Monday's German Cup match, the Bundesliga club said on Sunday.

headline.main: Kids Sing Song From John Oliver Show on DC Statehood
headline.print_headline: Kids Sing Song From John Oliver Show on DC Statehood

headline.main: Car Bomb Kills Seven in Eastern Libya as Islamic State Presses Offensive
headline.print_headline: Car Bomb Kills Seven in Eastern Libya as Islamic State Presses Offensive

docs.snippet: A car bomb exploded in Derna in eastern Libya on Sunday, killing at least seven people and wounding 19 others, medics and residents said, as Islamic State militants pressed an offensive to retake the port city....
docs.lead_paragraph: A car bomb exploded in Derna in eastern Libya on Sunday, killing at least seven people and wounding 19 others, medics and residents said, as Islamic State militants pressed an offensive to retake the port city.
